page.title: 15ASDA HYPERMARKET.
page.content: The first{ASDA}Store was built in 1965 but now there are 104 other branches. The name is taken from ASsociated DAries. The Leamington branch of ASDA was built in 1981 on the Sydenham Estate, to cater for the growing local population. There are parking spaces for 575 cars. Inside the store are 25 tills and 750 trolleys for use by the 24 000 customers who shop at the Hypermarket each week.The store employs 324 staff. The building contains 7 store rooms including a freezer room and cold rooms. Already there are plans to improve the store.
